entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 23 March 2023
